description: Lấy voucher từ tin nhắn Ecom
body:
SELECT * FROM [10.13.254.249].FPTShopVer2.dbo.LogSMS with (NOLOCK) WHERE Phone='$CURSOR$'
SELECT * FROM [10.13.254.249].FPTShopVer2.dbo.GetVoucherFromPos_Using with (NOLOCK) WHERE Phone=''
SELECT * FROM [10.13.254.249].FPTShopVer2.dbo.MiniGameCardPhone with (NOLOCK) WHERE Phone=''
SELECT * FROM [10.13.254.249].FPTShopVer2.dbo.MiniGameCardPhone with (NOLOCK) WHERE Note='' --Số báo danh
